price: Na kae Y’akoa Hiob, εberε a osu frεε ne Wura Nyankopͻn sε: “(Me Wura), ͻbonsam de ͻbrε ne ͻhaw ato me so “.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ عَبۡدَنَآ أَيُّوبَ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّي مَسَّنِيَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ بِنُصۡبٖ وَعَذَابٍ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur ʿabdanā ayyūba idh nādā rabbahu annī massaniya al-shayṭānu binuṣ'bin waʿadhābin
